title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.12 - Service fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 27.12 - Service fees

State Regulations
A producing broker or excess line broker, when the insured's home state is this State, shall not charge the insured any amount (including reimbursement for premium taxes or stamping fees), other than the premiums for the policy or insurer's policy fee, if any, unless the broker obtains a written memorandum, signed by the insured, specifying the amount and purpose in accordance with section
2119
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
27.12

Amended, New

York State Register October 8, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 40, eff. 10/8/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
